c:complexType.name: DiscreteCartesianAxisOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for discrete scale types.
For more information about cartesian axes please see the comments in the base class .
For more information on a specific type of discrete axis, please see:
and .

c:property.name: composite
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the axis should show discrete multi-dimensional data in a hierarchical form, when true, or a flattened form, when false.

c:property.name: clickAction
c:property.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when the user clicks on a tick label.

c:property.name: doubleClickAction
c:property.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when the user double-clicks on a tick label.
